      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.lang.String message)
        Public method that initializes the popup window with the specified message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be displayed in the popup window. It cannot be null or empty, a String object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if message is null or empty.

      • handleOuiButton

        public void handleOuiButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Public method that handles the user's choice of the yes option in the popup window.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent that triggered the method. It cannot be null, an ActionEvent object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if event is null.

      • handleNonButton

        public void handleNonButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Public method that handles the user's choice of the no option in the popup window.

        event - The ActionEvent that triggered the method. It cannot be null, an ActionEvent object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if event is null.

      • getResult

        public boolean getResult()
        Public method that returns the result of the user's choice in the popup window.
        Returns:
        true if the user chose the yes option, false if the user chose the no option or if an error occurred, a boolean.

        Private method that closes the popup window.
